txt.en: 'Ah, all that remains are the last levels of acclaim among the Lossoth, to become Kindred with the Lossoth of Forochel. If you wish to continue, I will help you gain such renown.\n\n'Do you wish to continue?'
'Alright, soon you will be Kindred with the Lossoth of Forochel. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered Kindred with the Lossoth of Forochel.
